Having the option in the option file doesn't matter; you just get a warning if you are not the superuser and the mysqld processes are started under your own Unix account.

    您可能希望对mysqld使用--user选项，但要执行此操作，您需要以unix超级用户（root）的身份运行mysqld_多脚本。在选项文件中拥有这个选项并不重要；如果您不是超级用户并且mysqld进程是在您自己的unix帐户下启动的，您只会收到一个警告。

The following example shows how you might set up an option file for use with mysqld_multi. The order in which the mysqld programs are started or stopped depends on the order in which they appear in the option file. Group numbers need not form an unbroken sequence. The first and fifth [mysqldN] groups were intentionally omitted from the example to illustrate that you can have “gaps” in the option file. This gives you more flexibility.

下面的示例演示如何设置选项文件以用于mysqld_multi。mysqld程序的启动或停止顺序取决于它们在选项文件中的显示顺序。组号不必形成完整的序列。示例中故意省略了第一个和第五个[mysqldn]组，以说明在选项文件中可以有“间隙”。这给了你更多的灵活性。

# This is an example of a my.cnf file for mysqld_multi.
# Usually this file is located in home dir ~/.my.cnf or /etc/my.cnf

[mysqld_multi]
mysqld     = /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld_safe
mysqladmin = /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqladmin
user       = multi_admin
password   = my_password

[mysqld2]
socket     = /tmp/mysql.sock2
port       = 3307
pid-file   = /usr/local/mysql/data2/hostname.pid2
datadir    = /usr/local/mysql/data2
language   = /usr/local/mysql/share/mysql/english
user       = unix_user1

[mysqld3]
mysqld     = /path/to/mysqld_safe
ledir      = /path/to/mysqld-binary/
mysqladmin = /path/to/mysqladmin
socket     = /tmp/mysql.sock3
port       = 3308
pid-file   = /usr/local/mysql/data3/hostname.pid3
datadir    = /usr/local/mysql/data3
language   = /usr/local/mysql/share/mysql/swedish
user       = unix_user2

[mysqld4]
socket     = /tmp/mysql.sock4
port       = 3309
pid-file   = /usr/local/mysql/data4/hostname.pid4
datadir    = /usr/local/mysql/data4
language   = /usr/local/mysql/share/mysql/estonia
user       = unix_user3

[mysqld6]
socket     = /tmp/mysql.sock6
port       = 3311
pid-file   = /usr/local/mysql/data6/hostname.pid6
datadir    = /usr/local/mysql/data6
language   = /usr/local/mysql/share/mysql/japanese
user       = unix_user4

See Section 4.2.2.2, “Using Option Files”.

参见第4.2.2.2节“使用选项文件”。

4.4 MySQL Installation-Related Programs

4.4.1 comp_err — Compile MySQL Error Message File
4.4.2 mysql_install_db — Initialize MySQL Data Directory
4.4.3 mysql_plugin — Configure MySQL Server Plugins
4.4.4 mysql_secure_installation — Improve MySQL Installation Security
4.4.5 mysql_ssl_rsa_setup — Create SSL/RSA Files
4.4.6 mysql_tzinfo_to_sql — Load the Time Zone Tables
4.4.7 mysql_upgrade — Check and Upgrade MySQL Tables

The programs in this section are used when installing or upgrading MySQL.

本节中的程序在安装或升级mysql时使用。

4.4.1 comp_err — Compile MySQL Error Message File

comp_err creates the errmsg.sys file that is used by mysqld to determine the error messages to display for different error codes. comp_err normally is run automatically when MySQL is built. It compiles the errmsg.sys file from the text file located at sql/share/errmsg-utf8.txt in MySQL source distributions.

comp_err创建errmsg.sys文件，mysqld使用该文件来确定要为不同错误代码显示的错误消息。编译mysql时，comp_err通常会自动运行。它从mysql源发行版中位于sql/share/errmsg-utf8.txt的文本文件编译errmsg.sys文件。

comp_err also generates mysqld_error.h, mysqld_ername.h, and sql_state.h header files.

comp_err还生成mysqld_error.h、mysqld_ername.h和sql_state.h头文件。

For more information about how error messages are defined, see the MySQL Internals Manual.

有关如何定义错误消息的详细信息，请参阅mysql内部手册。

Invoke comp_err like this:

像这样调用comp_err：

shell> comp_err [options]

comp_err supports the following options.

comp_err支持以下选项。

  • --help, -?

    --救命啊，-？

    Display a help message and exit.

    显示帮助消息并退出。

  • --charset=dir_name, -C dir_name

    --字符集=目录名，-C目录名

    The character set directory. The default is ../sql/share/charsets.

    字符集目录。默认值为../sql/share/charsets。

  • --debug=debug_options, -# debug_options

    --调试=调试选项，-调试选项

    Write a debugging log. A typical debug_options string is d:t:O,file_name. The default is d:t:O,/tmp/comp_err.trace.

    编写调试日志。典型的调试选项字符串是d:t:o，文件名。默认值是d:t:o，/tmp/comp_err.trace。

  • --debug-info, -T

    --调试信息，-t

    Print some debugging information when the program exits.

    当程序退出时打印一些调试信息。

  • --header_file=file_name, -H file_name

    --header_file=文件名，-h文件名

    The name of the error header file. The default is mysqld_error.h.

    错误头文件的名称。默认值是mysqld_error.h。

  • --in_file=file_name, -F file_name

    --in_file=文件名，-f文件名

    The name of the input file. The default is ../sql/share/errmsg-utf8.txt.

    输入文件的名称。默认为../sql/share/errmsg-utf8.txt。

  • --name_file=file_name, -N file_name

    --name_file=文件名，-n文件名

    The name of the error name file. The default is mysqld_ername.h.

    错误名称文件的名称。默认值是mysqld_ername.h。

  • --out_dir=dir_name, -D dir_name

    --out_dir=目录名，-d目录名

    The name of the output base directory. The default is ../sql/share/.

    输出基目录的名称。默认值为../sql/share/。

  • --out_file=file_name, -O file_name

    --out_file=文件名，-o文件名

    The name of the output file. The default is errmsg.sys.

    输出文件的名称。默认值为errmsg.sys。

  • --statefile=file_name, -S file_name

    --statefile=文件名，-s文件名

    The name for the SQLSTATE header file. The default is sql_state.h.

    sqlstate头文件的名称。默认值为sql_state.h。

  • --version, -V

    --版本，-v

    Display version information and exit.

    显示版本信息并退出。

4.4.2 mysql_install_db — Initialize MySQL Data Directory

Note

mysql_install_db is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.6 because its functionality has been integrated into mysqld, the MySQL server. To initialize a MySQL installation, invoke mysqld with the --initialize or --initialize-insecure option. For more information, see Section 2.10.1, “Initializing the Data Directory”. mysql_install_db will be removed in a future MySQL release.

mysql_install_db从mysql 5.7.6开始就被弃用，因为它的功能已经集成到mysql服务器mysqld中。要初始化mysql安装，请使用--initialize或--initialize unsecure选项调用mysqld。有关更多信息，请参见第2.10.1节“初始化数据目录”。mysql_install_db将在未来的mysql版本中删除。

mysql_install_db handles initialization tasks that must be performed before the MySQL server, mysqld, is ready to use:

mysql_install_db处理必须在mysql服务器mysqld准备好使用之前执行的初始化任务：

  • It initializes the MySQL data directory and creates the system tables that it contains.

    它初始化mysql数据目录并创建它包含的系统表。

  • It initializes the system tablespace and related data structures needed to manage InnoDB tables.

    它初始化管理innodb表所需的系统表空间和相关数据结构。

  • It loads the server-side help tables.

    它加载服务器端帮助表。

  • It installs the sys schema.

    它安装sys架构。

  • It creates an administrative account. Older versions of mysql_install_db may create anonymous-user accounts.

    它创建一个管理帐户。旧版本的mysql_install_db可能会创建匿名用户帐户。

Before MySQL 5.7.5, mysql_install_db is a Perl script and requires that Perl be installed. As of 5.7.5, mysql_install_db is written in C++ and supplied in binary distributions as an executable binary. In addition, a number of new options were added and old options removed. If you find that an option does not work as you expect, be sure to check which options apply in your version of mysql_install_db (invoke it with the --help option).

在mysql 5.7.5之前，mysql_install_db是一个perl脚本，需要安装perl。在5.7.5中，MySqLyStudioDB是用C++编写的，并以二进制分布的形式提供为可执行二进制文件。此外，还添加了一些新选项，删除了一些旧选项。如果发现某个选项无法按预期工作，请确保检查哪些选项适用于您的mysql_install_db版本（使用--help选项调用它）。

Secure-by-Default Deployment

Current versions of mysql_install_db produce a MySQL deployment that is secure by default. It is recommended that you use mysql_install_db from MySQL 5.7.5 or up for best security, but version-dependent information about security characteristics is included here for completeness (secure-by-default deployment was introduced in stages in MySQL 5.7).

mysql_install_db的当前版本生成默认安全的mysql部署。建议您使用mysql 5.7.5或更高版本中的mysql_install_db以获得最佳安全性，但此处包含了与版本相关的安全特性信息，以确保完整性（默认情况下，在mysql 5.7中分阶段引入了安全部署）。

MySQL 5.7.5 and up is secure by default, with these characteristics:

mysql 5.7.5及以上版本在默认情况下是安全的，具有以下特点：

  • A single administrative account named 'root'@'localhost' is created with a randomly generated password, which is marked expired.

    一个名为“root”@“localhost”的管理帐户是用随机生成的密码创建的，该密码被标记为过期。

  • No anonymous-user accounts are created.

    未创建匿名用户帐户。

  • No test database accessible by all users is created.

    没有创建所有用户都可以访问的测试数据库。

  • --admin-xxx options are available to control characteristics of the administrative account.

    --ADMIN XXX选项可用于控制管理帐户的特征。

  • The --random-password-file option is available to control where the random password is written.

    --random password file选项可用于控制随机密码的写入位置。

  • The --insecure option is available to suppress random password generation.

    --unsecure选项可用于抑制随机密码生成。

MySQL 5.7.4 is secure by default, with these characteristics:

mysql 5.7.4默认情况下是安全的，具有以下特点：

  • A single administrative account named 'root'@'localhost' is created with a randomly generated password, which is marked expired.

    一个名为“root”@“localhost”的管理帐户是用随机生成的密码创建的，该密码被标记为过期。

  • No anonymous-user accounts are created.

    未创建匿名用户帐户。

  • No test database accessible by all users is created.

    没有创建所有用户都可以访问的测试数据库。

  • The --skip-random-passwords option is available to suppress random password generation, and to create a test database.

    --skip random passwords选项可用于抑制随机密码生成并创建测试数据库。

MySQL 5.7.3 and earlier are not secure by default, with these characteristics:

mysql 5.7.3及更早版本在默认情况下不安全，具有以下特点：

  • Multiple administrative root accounts are created with no password.

    创建多个没有密码的管理根帐户。

  • Anonymous-user accounts are created.

    将创建匿名用户帐户。

  • A test database accessible by all users is created.

    将创建一个所有用户都可以访问的测试数据库。

  • The --random-passwords option is available to generate random passwords for administrative accounts and mark them expired, and to not create anonymous-user accounts.

    --random passwords选项可用于为管理帐户生成随机密码并将其标记为过期，并且不创建匿名用户帐户。

If mysql_install_db generates a random administative password, it writes the password to a file and displays the file name. The password entry includes a timestamp to indicate when it was written. By default, the file is .mysql_secret in the home directory of the effective user running the script. .mysql_secret is created with mode 600 to be accessible only to the operating system user for whom it is created.

如果mysql_install_db生成一个随机的管理密码，它会将密码写入文件并显示文件名。密码项包含一个时间戳，用于指示何时写入密码。默认情况下，文件是运行脚本的有效用户的主目录中的.mysql_secret。.mysql_secret是使用模式600创建的，只有为其创建的操作系统用户才能访问。

Important

When mysql_install_db generates a random password for the administrative account, it is necessary after mysql_install_db has been run to start the server, connect using the administrative account with the password written to the .mysql_secret file, and specify a new administrative password. Until this is done, the administrative account cannot be used for anything else. To change the password, you can use the SET PASSWORD statement (for example, with the mysql or mysqladmin client). After resetting the password, remove the .mysql_secret file; otherwise, if you run mysql_secure_installation, that command may see the file and expire the root password again as part of ensuring secure deployment.

当mysql_install_db为管理帐户生成随机密码时，必须在mysql_install_db运行后启动服务器，使用管理帐户连接并将密码写入.mysql_机密文件，然后指定新的管理密码。在此之前，管理帐户不能用于任何其他用途。要更改密码，可以使用set password语句（例如，对于mysql或mysqladmin客户端）。重置密码后，请删除.mysql_secret文件；否则，如果运行mysql_secure_安装，该命令可能会看到该文件并再次使根密码过期，以确保安全部署。

Invocation Syntax

Several changes to mysql_install_db were made in MySQL 5.7.5 that affect the invocation syntax. Change location to the MySQL installation directory and use the command appropriate to your version of MySQL:

mysql 5.7.5中对mysql_install_db进行了一些更改，这些更改会影响调用语法。将位置更改为mysql安装目录，并使用适合您的mysql版本的命令：

  • Invocation syntax for MySQL 5.7.5 and up:

    MySQL 5.7.5及以上版本的调用语法：

    shell> bin/mysql_install_db --datadir=path/to/datadir [other_options]

    The --datadir option is mandatory. mysql_install_db creates the data directory, which must not already exist:

    --datadir选项是必需的。MySqLyStudioDB创建数据目录，该目录必须不存在：

    • If the data directory does already exist, you are performing an upgrade operation (not an install operation) and should run mysql_upgrade, not mysql_install_db. See Section 4.4.7, “mysql_upgrade — Check and Upgrade MySQL Tables”.

      如果数据目录确实已经存在，则正在执行升级操作（不是安装操作），应该运行非终结符，而不是非终结符。见4.4.7节，“mysql_upgrade-检查和升级mysql表”。

    • If the data directory does not exist but mysql_install_db fails, you must remove any partially created data directory before running mysql_install_db again.

      如果数据目录不存在，但MySQL ListApultDB失败，则必须在运行MySqLyStudioDB之前删除任何部分创建的数据目录。

  • Invocation syntax before MySQL 5.7.5:

    mysql 5.7.5之前的调用语法：

    shell> scripts/mysql_install_db [options]

Because the MySQL server, mysqld, must access the data directory when it runs later, you should either run mysql_install_db from the same system account that will be used for running mysqld, or run it as root and specify the --user option to indicate the user name that mysqld will run as. It might be necessary to specify other options such as --basedir if mysql_install_db does not use the correct location for the installation directory. For example:

由于mysql服务器mysqld在以后运行时必须访问数据目录，因此您应该从用于运行mysqld的同一系统帐户运行mysql_install_db，或者以根用户身份运行它，并指定--user选项以指示mysqld将以何种用户名运行。如果mysql_install_db没有为安装目录使用正确的位置，则可能需要指定其他选项，例如--basedir。例如：

shell> bin/mysql_install_db --user=mysql \
         --basedir=/opt/mysql/mysql \
         --datadir=/opt/mysql/mysql/data
Note

After mysql_install_db sets up the InnoDB system tablespace, changes to some tablespace characteristics require setting up a whole new instance. This includes the file name of the first file in the system tablespace and the number of undo logs. If you do not want to use the default values, make sure that the settings for the innodb_data_file_path and innodb_log_file_size configuration parameters are in place in the MySQL configuration file before running mysql_install_db. Also make sure to specify as necessary other parameters that affect the creation and location of InnoDB files, such as innodb_data_home_dir and innodb_log_group_home_dir.

mysql_install_db设置innodb系统表空间后，对某些表空间特性的更改需要设置一个全新的实例。这包括系统表空间中第一个文件的文件名和撤消日志的数量。如果不想使用默认值，请确保在运行mysql-install-db之前，innodb-data-file-path和innodb-log-file-size配置参数的设置已在mysql配置文件中就位。另外，请确保根据需要指定影响innodb文件创建和位置的其他参数，例如innodb_data_home_dir和innodb_log_group_home_dir。

If those options are in your configuration file but that file is not in a location that MySQL reads by default, specify the file location using the --defaults-extra-file option when you run mysql_install_db.

如果这些选项位于配置文件中，但该文件不在mysql默认读取的位置，请在运行mysql_install_db时使用--defaults extra file选项指定文件位置。

Note

If you have set a custom TMPDIR environment variable when performing the installation, and the specified directory is not accessible, mysql_install_db may fail. If so, unset TMPDIR or set TMPDIR to point to the system temporary directory (usually /tmp).

如果在执行安装时设置了自定义tmpdir环境变量，并且指定的目录不可访问，mysql_install_db可能会失败。如果是，请取消设置tmpdir或将tmpdir设置为指向系统临时目录（通常为/tmp）。

Administrative Account Creation

mysql_install_db creates an administrative account named 'root'@'localhost' by default. (Before MySQL 5.7.4, mysql_install_db creates additional root accounts, such as 'root'@'127.0.0.1'. This is no longer done.)

mysql_install_db默认创建名为“root”@“localhost”的管理帐户。（在mysql 5.7.4之前，mysql_install_db会创建额外的根帐户，例如'root'@'127.0.0.1'。这已经不做了。）

As of MySQL 5.7.5, mysql_install_db provides options that enable you to control several aspects of the administrative account:

从mysql 5.7.5开始，mysql_install_db提供了一些选项，使您能够控制管理帐户的几个方面：

  • To change the user or host parts of the account name, use --login-path, or --admin-user and --admin-host.

    要更改帐户名的用户或主机部分，请使用--login path或--admin user和--admin host。

  • --insecure suppresses generation of a random password.

    --不安全抑制随机密码的生成。

  • --admin-auth-plugin specifies the authentication plugin.

    --admin auth plugin指定身份验证插件。

  • --admin-require-ssl specifies whether the account must use SSL connections.

    --admin require ssl指定帐户是否必须使用ssl连接。

For more information, see the descriptions of those options.

有关详细信息，请参见这些选项的说明。

mysql_install_db assigns mysql.user system table rows a nonempty plugin column value to set the authentication plugin. The default value is mysql_native_password. The value can be changed using the --admin-auth-plugin option in MySQL 5.7.5 and up (as noted previously), or by setting the default_authentication_plugin system variable in MySQL 5.7.2 to 5.7.4.

mysql_install_db为mysql.user系统表行分配一个非空的plugin列值以设置身份验证插件。默认值为mysql_native_password。可以使用mysql 5.7.5及更高版本中的--admin auth plugin选项（如前所述）或通过将mysql 5.7.2中的默认_authentication_plugin系统变量设置为5.7.4来更改该值。

Default my.cnf File

As of MySQL 5.7.5, mysql_install_db creates no default my.cnf file.

从mysql 5.7.5开始，mysql_install_db不创建默认的my.cnf文件。

Before MySQL 5.7.5, mysql_install_db creates a default option file named my.cnf in the base installation directory. This file is created from a template included in the distribution package named my-default.cnf. You can find the template in or under the base installation directory. When started using mysqld_safe, the server uses my.cnf file by default. If my.cnf already exists, mysql_install_db assumes it to be in use and writes a new file named my-new.cnf instead.

在mysql 5.7.5之前，mysql_install_db会在基本安装目录中创建一个名为my.cnf的默认选项文件。此文件是根据名为my-default.cnf的分发包中包含的模板创建的。您可以在基本安装目录中或其下找到模板。当开始使用mysqld_safe时，服务器默认使用my.cnf文件。如果My.CNF已经存在，MySqLyStudioDB假设它正在使用，并写入一个名为MY-Ne.CNF的新文件。

Note

As of MySQL 5.7.18, my-default.cnf is no longer included in or installed by distribution packages.

从mysql 5.7.18开始，my-default.cnf不再包含在分发包中或由分发包安装。

With one exception, the settings in the default option file are commented and have no effect. The exception is that the file sets the sql_mode system variable to NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES. This setting produces a server configuration that results in errors rather than warnings for bad data in operations that modify transactional tables. See Section 5.1.10, “Server SQL Modes”.

除了一个例外，默认选项文件中的设置将被注释，并且不起作用。例外情况是，该文件将sql_mode系统变量设置为no_engine_substitution，strict_trans_tables。此设置生成一个服务器配置，该配置将导致在修改事务表的操作中出现错误而不是错误数据的警告。参见第5.1.10节“服务器SQL模式”。

Command Options

mysql_install_db supports the following options, which can be specified on the command line or in the [mysql_install_db] group of an option file. For information about option files used by MySQL programs, see Section 4.2.2.2, “Using Option Files”.

mysql_install_db支持以下选项，可以在命令行或选项文件的[mysql_install_db]组中指定。有关mysql程序使用的选项文件的信息，请参阅4.2.2.2节“使用选项文件”。

Before MySQL 5.7.5, mysql_install_db passes unrecognized options to mysqld.

在mysql 5.7.5之前，mysql_install_db将无法识别的选项传递给mysqld。

Table 4.7 mysql_install_db Options

表4.7 MySQL安装数据库选项

Option Name Description Introduced Removed
--admin-auth-plugin Administrative account authentication plugin 5.7.5
--admin-host Administrative account name host part 5.7.5
--admin-require-ssl Require SSL for administrative account 5.7.5
--admin-user Administrative account name user part 5.7.5
--basedir Path to base directory
--builddir Path to build directory (for out-of-source builds)
--cross-bootstrap For internal use 5.7.5
--datadir Path to data directory
--defaults Read default option files 5.7.5
--defaults-extra-file Read named option file in addition to usual option files
--defaults-file Read only named option file
--extra-sql-file Optional SQL file to execute during bootstrap 5.7.5
--force Run even if DNS does not work 5.7.5
--help Display help message and exit
--insecure Do not generate administrative account random password 5.7.5
--keep-my-cnf Keep existing my.cnf file, do not create new one 5.7.4 5.7.5
--lc-messages Locale for error messages 5.7.5
--lc-messages-dir Directory where error messages are installed 5.7.5
--ldata Synonym for --datadir 5.7.5
--login-file File to read for login path information 5.7.5
--login-path Read login path options from .mylogin.cnf 5.7.5
--mysqld-file Path to mysqld binary 5.7.5
--no-defaults Read no option files
--random-password-file File in which to write administrative account random password 5.7.5
--random-passwords Generate administrative account random password 5.7.4
--rpm For internal use 5.7.5
--skip-name-resolve Use IP addresses rather than host names in grant tables 5.7.5
--skip-random-passwords Do not generate administrative account random password 5.7.4 5.7.5
--skip-sys-schema Do not install or upgrade the sys schema 5.7.7
--srcdir For internal use
--user Operating system user under which to execute mysqld
--verbose Verbose mode
--version Display version information and exit 5.7.5
--windows For internal use 5.7.5

  • --help, -?

    --救命啊，-？

    Display a help message and exit.

    显示帮助消息并退出。

  • --admin-auth-plugin=plugin_name

    --admin auth plugin=插件名称

    The authentication plugin to use for the administrative account. The default is mysql_native_password.

    用于管理帐户的身份验证插件。默认为mysql_native_password。

  • --admin-host=host_name

    --admin host=主机名

    The host part to use for the adminstrative account name. The default is localhost. This option is ignored if --login-path is also specified.

    用于管理帐户名的主机部分。默认值为localhost。如果还指定了--login path，则忽略此选项。

  • --admin-require-ssl

    --管理员需要SSL

    Whether to require SSL for the administrative account. The default is not to require it. With this option enabled, the statement that mysql_install_db uses to create the account includes a REQUIRE SSL clause. As a result, the administrative account must use secure connections when connecting to the server.

    管理帐户是否需要SSL。默认情况是不需要它。启用此选项后，mysql_install_db用于创建帐户的语句包含一个require ssl子句。因此，管理帐户在连接到服务器时必须使用安全连接。

  • --admin-user=user_name

    --admin user=用户名

    The user part to use for the adminstrative account name. The default is root. This option is ignored if --login-path is also specified.

    用于管理帐户名的用户部分。默认为根。如果还指定了--login path，则忽略此选项。

  • --basedir=dir_name

    --basedir=目录名

    The path to the MySQL installation directory.

    MySQL安装目录的路径。

  • --builddir=dir_name

    --buildDir=目录名

    For use with --srcdir and out-of-source builds. Set this to the location of the directory where the built files reside.

    用于--srcdir和源外生成。将此设置为生成文件所在目录的位置。

  • --cross-bootstrap

    --交叉引导

    For internal use. This option is used for building system tables on one host intended for another.

    供内部使用。此选项用于在一台主机上为另一台主机生成系统表。

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

  • --datadir=dir_name

    --datadir=目录名

    The path to the MySQL data directory. Only the last component of the path name is created if it does not exist; the parent directory must already exist or an error occurs.

    mysql数据目录的路径。如果路径名不存在，则只创建路径名称的最后一个组件；父目录必须已经存在或发生错误。

    Note

    As of MySQL 5.7.5, the --datadir option is mandatory and the data directory must not already exist. (It remains true that the parent directory must exist.)

    至于MySQL 5.7.5，-DATADIR选项是强制性的，并且数据目录必须不存在。（仍然必须存在父目录。）

  • --defaults

    --默认值

    This option causes mysql_install_db to invoke mysqld in such a way that it reads option files from the default locations. If given as --no-defaults, and --defaults-file or --defaults-extra-file is not also specified, mysql_install_db passes --no-defaults to mysqld, to prevent option files from being read. This may help if program startup fails due to reading unknown options from an option file.

    此选项使mysql_install_db调用mysqld，从而从默认位置读取选项文件。如果指定为--no defaults，并且--defaults file或--defaults extra file，mysql_install_db passes--no defaults to mysqld，以防止读取选项文件。如果由于从选项文件中读取未知选项而导致程序启动失败，这可能会有所帮助。

  • --defaults-extra-file=file_name

    --defaults extra file=文件名

    Read this option file after the global option file but (on Unix) before the user option file. If the file does not exist or is otherwise inaccessible, an error occurs. file_name is interpreted relative to the current directory if given as a relative path name rather than a full path name.

    在全局选项文件之后，但在用户选项文件之前（在UNIX上）读取此选项文件。如果文件不存在或无法访问，则会发生错误。如果将文件名指定为相对路径名而不是完整路径名，则将其解释为相对于当前目录。

    This option is passed by mysql_install_db to mysqld.

    mysql_install_db将此选项传递给mysqld。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --defaults-file=file_name

    --默认文件=文件名

    Use only the given option file. If the file does not exist or is otherwise inaccessible, an error occurs. file_name is interpreted relative to the current directory if given as a relative path name rather than a full path name.

    只使用给定的选项文件。如果文件不存在或无法访问，则会发生错误。如果将文件名指定为相对路径名而不是完整路径名，则将其解释为相对于当前目录。

    This option is passed by mysql_install_db to mysqld.

    mysql_install_db将此选项传递给mysqld。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --extra-sql-file=file_name, -f file_name

    --extra sql file=文件名，-f文件名

    This option names a file containing additional SQL statements to be executed after the standard bootstrapping statements. Accepted statement syntax in the file is like that of the mysql command-line client, including support for multiple-line C-style comments and delimiter handling to enable definition of stored programs.

    此选项命名包含在标准引导语句之后要执行的其他SQL语句的文件。文件中接受的语句语法与mysql命令行客户机类似，包括支持多行c风格的注释和分隔符处理，以启用存储程序的定义。

  • --force

    --武力

    Cause mysql_install_db to run even if DNS does not work. Grant table entries normally created using host names will use IP addresses instead.

    使mysql_install_db运行，即使dns不工作。通常使用主机名创建的GRANT表条目将使用IP地址。

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

  • --insecure

    --不安全

    Do not generate a random password for the adminstrative account.

    不要为管理帐户生成随机密码。

    Note

    The --insecure option was added in MySQL 5.7.5, replacing the --skip-random-passwords option.

    在mysql 5.7.5中添加了--insecure选项，取代了--skip random passwords选项。

    If --insecure is not given, it is necessary after mysql_install_db has been run to start the server, connect using the administrative account with the password written to the .mysql_secret file, and specify a new administrative password. Until this is done, the administrative account cannot be used for anything else. To change the password, you can use the SET PASSWORD statement (for example, with the mysql or mysqladmin client). After resetting the password, remove the .mysql_secret file; otherwise, if you run mysql_secure_installation, that command may see the file and expire the root password again as part of ensuring secure deployment.

    如果未提供--unsecure，则在运行mysql_install_db之后，有必要启动服务器，使用管理帐户与写入.mysql_机密文件的密码进行连接，并指定新的管理密码。在此之前，管理帐户不能用于任何其他用途。要更改密码，可以使用set password语句（例如，对于mysql或mysqladmin客户端）。重置密码后，请删除.mysql_secret文件；否则，如果运行mysql_secure_安装，该命令可能会看到该文件并再次使根密码过期，以确保安全部署。

  • --keep-my-cnf

    --保留我的CNF

    Tell mysql_install_db to preserve any existing my.cnf file and not create a new default my.cnf file.

    告诉MySqLyStudioDB保存任何现有的My.CNF文件，不创建一个新的默认My.CNF文件。

    This option was added in MySQL 5.7.4 and removed in 5.7.5. As of 5.7.5, mysql_install_db does not create a default my.cnf file.

    这个选项在mysql 5.7.4中添加，在5.7.5中删除。从5.7.5开始，mysql_install_db不会创建默认的my.cnf文件。

  • --lc-messages=name

    --LC Messages=名称

    The locale to use for error messages. The default is en_US. The argument is converted to a language name and combined with the value of --lc-messages-dir to produce the location for the error message file. See Section 10.12, “Setting the Error Message Language”.

    用于错误消息的区域设置。默认为en_us。参数将转换为语言名，并与--lc messages dir的值结合使用，以生成错误消息文件的位置。参见第10.12节“设置错误消息语言”。

  • --lc-messages-dir=dir_name

    --lc messages dir=目录名

    The directory where error messages are located. The value is used together with the value of --lc-messages to produce the location for the error message file. See Section 10.12, “Setting the Error Message Language”.

    错误消息所在的目录。该值与--lc消息的值一起使用，以生成错误消息文件的位置。参见第10.12节“设置错误消息语言”。

  • --ldata=dir_name

    --ldata=目录名

    A synonym for --datadir.

    --datadir的同义词。

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

  • --login-file=file_name

    --login file=文件名

    The file from which to read the login path if the --login-path=file_name option is specified. The default file is .mylogin.cnf.

    如果指定了--login path=file_name选项，则从中读取登录路径的文件。默认文件是.mylogin.cnf。

  • --login-path=name

    --登录路径=名称

    Read options from the named login path in the .mylogin.cnf login path file. The default login path is client. (To read a different file, use the --login-file=name option.) A “login path” is an option group containing options that specify which MySQL server to connect to and which account to authenticate as. To create or modify a login path file, use the mysql_config_editor utility. See Section 4.6.6, “mysql_config_editor — MySQL Configuration Utility”.

    从.mylogin.cnf登录路径文件中的命名登录路径读取选项。默认登录路径是client。（若要读取其他文件，请使用--login file=name选项。）“登录路径”是一个选项组，其中包含指定要连接到哪个mysql服务器以及要作为哪个帐户进行身份验证的选项。要创建或修改登录路径文件，请使用mysql配置编辑器实用程序。参见第4.6.6节“mysql配置编辑器-mysql配置实用程序”。

    If the --login-path option is specified, the user, host, and password values are taken from the login path and used to create the administrative account. The password must be defined in the login path or an error occurs, unless the --insecure option is also specified. In addition, with --login-path, any --admin-host and --admin-user options are ignored.

    如果指定了--login path选项，则从登录路径中获取用户、主机和密码值，并用于创建管理帐户。必须在登录路径中定义密码，否则将发生错误，除非还指定了--unsecure选项。此外，使用--login path，将忽略任何--admin主机和--admin用户选项。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --mysqld-file=file_name

    --mysqld file=文件名

    The path name of the mysqld binary to execute. The option value must be an absolute path name or an error occurs.

    要执行的mysqld二进制文件的路径名。选项值必须是绝对路径名，否则将出错。

    If this option is not given, mysql_install_db searches for mysqld in these locations:

    如果未提供此选项，mysql_install_db将在以下位置搜索mysqld：

    • In the bin directory under the --basedir option value, if that option was given.

      在-basedir选项值下的bin目录中，如果给定了该选项。

    • In the bin directory under the --srcdir option value, if that option was given.

      在--srcdir选项值下的bin目录中，如果给定了该选项。

    • In the bin directory under the --builddir option value, if that option was given.

      在--builddir选项值下的bin目录中，如果给定了该选项。

    • In the local directory and in the bin and sbin directories under the local directory.

      在本地目录以及本地目录下的bin和sbin目录中。

    • In /usr/bin, /usr/sbin, /usr/local/bin, /usr/local/sbin, /opt/local/bin, /opt/local/sbin.

      在/usr/bin、/usr/sbin、/usr/local/bin、/usr/local/sbin、/opt/local/bin、/opt/local/sbin中。

  • --no-defaults

    --无默认值

    Before MySQL 5.7.5, do not read any option files. If program startup fails due to reading unknown options from an option file, --no-defaults can be used to prevent them from being read. For behavior of this option as of MySQL 5.7.5, see the description of --defaults.

    在mysql 5.7.5之前，不要读取任何选项文件。如果由于从选项文件中读取未知选项而导致程序启动失败，-不能使用默认值来阻止读取这些选项。对于mysql 5.7.5中这个选项的行为，请参见--defaults的描述。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --random-password-file=file_name

    --random password file=文件名

    The path name of the file in which to write the randomly generated password for the administrative account. The option value must be an absolute path name or an error occurs. The default is $HOME/.mysql_secret.

    要在其中为管理帐户写入随机生成的密码的文件的路径名。选项值必须是绝对路径名，否则将出错。默认值为$home/.mysql\u secret。

  • --random-passwords

    --随机密码

    Note

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.4 and replaced with --skip-random-passwords, which was in turn removed in MySQL 5.7.5 and replaced with --insecure.

    这个选项在mysql 5.7.4中被删除，替换为--skip random passwords，在mysql 5.7.5中依次被删除，替换为--unsecure。

    On Unix platforms, this option provides for more secure MySQL installation. Invoking mysql_install_db with --random-passwords causes it to perform the following actions in addition to its normal operation:

    在unix平台上，此选项提供了更安全的mysql安装。使用--random passwords调用mysql_install_db，除了正常操作外，还会执行以下操作：

    • The installation process creates a random password, assigns it to the initial MySQL root accounts, and marks the password expired for those accounts.

      安装过程将创建一个随机密码，将其分配给初始mysql根帐户，并将这些帐户的密码标记为过期。

    • The initial random root password is written to the .mysql_secret file in the directory named by the HOME environment variable. Depending on operating system, using a command such as sudo may cause the value of HOME to refer to the home directory of the root system user. .mysql_secret is created with mode 600 to be accessible only to the operating system user for whom it is created.

      初始随机根密码将写入home环境变量命名的目录中的.mysql_secret文件。根据操作系统的不同，使用sudo之类的命令可能会导致home的值引用根系统用户的home目录。.mysql_secret是使用模式600创建的，只有为其创建的操作系统用户才能访问。

      If .mysql_secret already exists, the new password information is appended to it. Each password entry includes a timestamp to indicate when it was written.

      如果.MySQL文件已经存在，则将新密码信息附加到它。每个密码条目都包含一个时间戳，用于指示何时写入密码。

    • No anonymous-user MySQL accounts are created.

      没有创建匿名用户mysql帐户。

    As a result of these actions, it is necessary after installation to start the server, connect as root using the password written to the .mysql_secret file, and specify a new root password. Until this is done, root cannot do anything else. This must be done for each root account you intend to use. To change the password, you can use the SET PASSWORD statement (for example, with the mysql client). You can also use mysqladmin or mysql_secure_installation.

    由于这些操作，安装后需要启动服务器，使用写入.mysql_机密文件的密码以根用户身份连接，并指定新的根用户密码。在此之前，根不能做任何其他事情。必须为您要使用的每个根帐户执行此操作。要更改密码，可以使用set password语句（例如，在mysql客户机上）。您还可以使用mysqladmin或mysql_secure_安装。

    New install operations (not upgrades) using RPM packages and Solaris PKG packages invoke mysql_install_db with the --random-passwords option. (Install operations using RPMs for Unbreakable Linux Network are unaffected because they do not use mysql_install_db.)

    使用rpm包和solaris pkg包的新安装操作（不是升级）使用--random passwords选项调用mysql_install_db。（对于牢不可破的Linux网络，使用RPM的安装操作不受影响，因为它们不使用mysql_install_db。）

    For install operations using a binary .tar.gz distribution or a source distribution, you can invoke mysql_install_db with the --random-passwords option manually to make your MySQL installation more secure. This is recommended, particularly for sites with sensitive data.

    对于使用binary.tar.gz发行版或源发行版的安装操作，可以使用--random passwords选项手动调用mysql_install_db，以使mysql安装更加安全。建议这样做，特别是对于具有敏感数据的站点。

  • --rpm

    --转速

    For internal use. This option is used during the MySQL installation process for install operations performed using RPM packages.

    供内部使用。此选项在mysql安装过程中用于使用rpm包执行的安装操作。

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

  • --skip-name-resolve

    --跳过名称解析

    Use IP addresses rather than host names when creating grant table entries. This option can be useful if your DNS does not work.

    创建授权表条目时使用IP地址而不是主机名。如果您的dns不工作，此选项可能很有用。

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

  • --skip-random-passwords

    --跳过随机密码

    Note

    The --skip-random-passwords option was added in MySQL 5.7.4, replacing the --random-passwords option. --skip-random-passwords was in turn removed in MySQL 5.7.5 and replaced with --insecure.

    mysql 5.7.4中添加了--skip random passwords选项，取代了--random passwords选项。--skip random密码在mysql 5.7.5中依次被删除，并替换为--unsecure。

    As of MySQL 5.7.4, MySQL deployments produced using mysql_install_db are secure by default. When invoked without the --skip-random-passwords option, mysql_install_db uses these default deployment characteristics:

    从mysql 5.7.4开始，使用mysql_install_db生成的mysql部署在默认情况下是安全的。在没有--skip random passwords选项的情况下调用时，mysql_install_db使用以下默认部署特性：

    • The installation process creates a single root account, 'root'@'localhost', automatically generates a random password for this account, and marks the password expired.

      安装过程将创建一个根帐户“root”@“localhost”，自动为此帐户生成一个随机密码，并将密码标记为过期。

    • The initial random root password is written to the .mysql_secret file in the home directory of the effective user running the script. .mysql_secret is created with mode 600 to be accessible only to the operating system user for whom it is created.

      初始随机根密码将写入运行脚本的有效用户的主目录中的.mysql_secret文件。.mysql_secret是使用模式600创建的，只有为其创建的操作系统用户才能访问。

      If .mysql_secret already exists, the new password information is appended to it. Each password entry includes a timestamp to indicate when it was written.

      如果.MySQL文件已经存在，则将新密码信息附加到它。每个密码条目都包含一个时间戳，用于指示何时写入密码。

    • No anonymous-user MySQL accounts are created.

      没有创建匿名用户mysql帐户。

    • No test database is created.

      未创建测试数据库。

    As a result of these actions, it is necessary after installation to start the server, connect as root using the password written to the .mysql_secret file, and specify a new root password. Until this is done, the administrative account cannot be used for anything else. To change the password, you can use the SET PASSWORD statement (for example, with the mysql client). You can also use mysqladmin or mysql_secure_installation.

    由于这些操作，安装后需要启动服务器，使用写入.mysql_机密文件的密码以根用户身份连接，并指定新的根用户密码。在此之前，管理帐户不能用于任何其他用途。要更改密码，可以使用set password语句（例如，在mysql客户机上）。您还可以使用mysqladmin或mysql_secure_安装。

    To produce a MySQL deployment that is not secure by default, you must explicitly specify the --skip-random-passwords option when you invoke mysql_install_db. With this option, mysql_install_db performs the following actions:

    要生成默认情况下不安全的mysql部署，必须在调用mysql_install_db时显式指定--skip random passwords选项。使用此选项，mysql_install_db将执行以下操作：

    • No random password is generated for the 'root'@'localhost' account.

      没有为“root”@“localhost”帐户生成随机密码。

    • A test database is created that is accessible by any user.

      将创建可由任何用户访问的测试数据库。

  • --skip-sys-schema

    --跳过系统架构

    As of MySQL 5.7.7, mysql_install_db installs the sys schema. The --skip-sys-schema option suppresses this behavior. This option was added in MySQL 5.7.7.

    从mysql 5.7.7开始，mysql_install_db安装sys模式。--skip sys schema选项禁止此行为。这个选项是在mysql 5.7.7中添加的。

  • --srcdir=dir_name

    --srcdir=目录名

    For internal use. This option specifies the directory under which mysql_install_db looks for support files such as the error message file and the file for populating the help tables.

    供内部使用。此选项指定mysql_install_db查找支持文件（如错误消息文件和用于填充帮助表的文件）的目录。

  • --user=user_name, -u user_name

    --user=用户名，-u用户名

    The system (login) user name to use for running mysqld. Files and directories created by mysqld will be owned by this user. You must be the system root user to use this option. By default, mysqld runs using your current login name and files and directories that it creates will be owned by you.

    用于运行mysqld的系统（登录）用户名。mysqld创建的文件和目录将归此用户所有。您必须是系统根用户才能使用此选项。默认情况下，mysqld使用您当前的登录名运行，它创建的文件和目录将归您所有。

  • --verbose, -v

    --冗长，-v

    Verbose mode. Print more information about what the program does. You can use this option to see the mysqld command that mysql_install_db invokes to start the server in bootstrap mode.

    详细模式。打印有关程序功能的详细信息。可以使用此选项查看mysql_install_db调用的mysqld命令，以引导模式启动服务器。

  • --version, -V

    --版本，-v

    Display version information and exit.

    显示版本信息并退出。

  • --windows

    --窗口

    For internal use. This option is used for creating Windows distributions. It is a deprecated alias for --cross-bootstrap

    供内部使用。此选项用于创建windows发行版。它是一个不推荐使用的别名--cross bootstrap

    This option was removed in MySQL 5.7.5.

    在mysql 5.7.5中删除了此选项。

4.4.3 mysql_plugin — Configure MySQL Server Plugins

Note

mysql_plugin is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.11 and removed in MySQL 8.0. Alternatives include loading plugins at server startup using the --plugin-load or --plugin-load-add option, or at runtime using the INSTALL PLUGIN statement.

mysql_插件从mysql 5.7.11开始被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。替代方法包括在服务器启动时使用--plugin load或--plugin load add选项加载插件，或者在运行时使用install plugin语句加载插件。

The mysql_plugin utility enables MySQL administrators to manage which plugins a MySQL server loads. It provides an alternative to manually specifying the --plugin-load option at server startup or using the INSTALL PLUGIN and UNINSTALL PLUGIN statements at runtime.

mysql_plugin实用程序允许mysql管理员管理mysql服务器加载的插件。它提供了在服务器启动时手动指定--plugin load选项或在运行时使用install plugin和uninstall plugin语句的替代方法。

Depending on whether mysql_plugin is invoked to enable or disable plugins, it inserts or deletes rows in the mysql.plugin table that serves as a plugin registry. (To perform this operation, mysql_plugin invokes the MySQL server in bootstrap mode. This means that the server must not already be running.) For normal server startups, the server loads and enables plugins listed in mysql.plugin automatically. For additional control over plugin activation, use --plugin_name options named for specific plugins, as described in Section 5.5.1, “Installing and Uninstalling Plugins”.

根据是否调用mysql_plugin来启用或禁用插件，它会插入或删除mysql.plugin表中用作插件注册表的行。（要执行此操作，mysql_plugin以引导模式调用mysql服务器。这意味着服务器必须尚未运行。）对于正常的服务器启动，服务器将自动加载并启用mysql.plugin中列出的插件。要进一步控制插件激活，请使用为特定插件命名的--plugin_name选项，如5.5.1节“安装和卸载插件”中所述。

Each invocation of mysql_plugin reads a configuration file to determine how to configure the plugins contained in a single plugin library file. To invoke mysql_plugin, use this syntax:

每次调用mysql_plugin都会读取一个配置文件，以确定如何配置单个插件库文件中包含的插件。要调用mysql_插件，请使用以下语法：

mysql_plugin [options] plugin {ENABLE|DISABLE}

plugin is the name of the plugin to configure. ENABLE or DISABLE (not case-sensitive) specify whether to enable or disable components of the plugin library named in the configuration file. The order of the plugin and ENABLE or DISABLE arguments does not matter.

plugin是要配置的插件的名称。启用或禁用（不区分大小写）指定是启用还是禁用配置文件中命名的插件库的组件。插件和enable或disable参数的顺序无关紧要。

For example, to configure components of a plugin library file named myplugins.so on Linux or myplugins.dll on Windows, specify a plugin value of myplugins. Suppose that this plugin library contains three plugins, plugin1, plugin2, and plugin3, all of which should be configured under mysql_plugin control. By convention, configuration files have a suffix of .ini and the same base name as the plugin library, so the default configuration file name for this plugin library is myplugins.ini. The configuration file contents look like this:

例如，要配置Linux上名为myplugins.so或Windows上名为myplugins.dll的插件库文件的组件，请指定myplugins的插件值。假设这个插件库包含三个插件：plugin1、plugin2和plugin3，所有这些插件都应该在mysql_plugin控件下配置。按照惯例，配置文件的后缀为.ini，与插件库的基名相同，因此此插件库的默认配置文件名为myplugins.ini。配置文件内容如下：

myplugins
plugin1
plugin2
plugin3

The first line in the myplugins.ini file is the name of the library file, without any extension such as .so or .dll. The remaining lines are the names of the components to be enabled or disabled. Each value in the file should be on a separate line. Lines on which the first character is '#' are taken as comments and ignored.

myplugins.ini文件的第一行是库文件的名称，没有任何扩展名，如.so或.dll。其余行是要启用或禁用的组件的名称。文件中的每个值都应该在单独的行上。第一个字符为“”的行将被视为注释并忽略。

To enable the plugins listed in the configuration file, invoke mysql_plugin this way:

要启用配置文件中列出的插件，请按以下方式调用mysql_plugin：

shell> mysql_plugin myplugins ENABLE

To disable the plugins, use DISABLE rather than ENABLE.

要禁用插件，请使用disable而不是enable。

An error occurs if mysql_plugin cannot find the configuration file or plugin library file, or if mysql_plugin cannot start the MySQL server.

如果mysql_plugin找不到配置文件或插件库文件，或者mysql_plugin无法启动mysql服务器，则会发生错误。

mysql_plugin supports the following options, which can be specified on the command line or in the [mysqld] group of any option file. For options specified in a [mysqld] group, mysql_plugin recognizes the --basedir, --datadir, and --plugin-dir options and ignores others. For information about option files used by MySQL programs, see Section 4.2.2.2, “Using Option Files”.

mysql_插件支持以下选项，可以在命令行或任何选项文件的[mysqld]组中指定。对于在[mysqld]组中指定的选项，mysql_plugin会识别--basedir、-datadir和--plugin dir选项并忽略其他选项。有关mysql程序使用的选项文件的信息，请参阅4.2.2.2节“使用选项文件”。

Table 4.8 mysql_plugin Options

表4.8 mysql插件选项

Option Name Description
--basedir The server base directory
--datadir The server data directory
--help Display help message and exit
--my-print-defaults Path to my_print_defaults
--mysqld Path to server
--no-defaults Do not read configuration file
--plugin-dir Directory where plugins are installed
--plugin-ini The plugin configuration file
--print-defaults Show configuration file defaults
--verbose Verbose mode
--version Display version information and exit

  • --help, -?

    --救命啊，-？

    Display a help message and exit.

    显示帮助消息并退出。

  • --basedir=dir_name, -b dir_name

    --basedir=目录名，-b目录名

    The server base directory.

    服务器基本目录。

  • --datadir=dir_name, -d dir_name

    --datadir=目录名，-d目录名

    The server data directory.

    服务器数据目录。

  • --my-print-defaults=file_name, -b file_name

    --我的打印默认值=文件名，-B文件名

    The path to the my_print_defaults program.

    我的打印默认程序的路径。

  • --mysqld=file_name, -b file_name

    --mysqld=文件名，-b文件名

    The path to the mysqld server.

    mysqld服务器的路径。

  • --no-defaults, -p

    --无默认值，-p

    Do not read values from the configuration file. This option enables an administrator to skip reading defaults from the configuration file.

    不要从配置文件中读取值。此选项允许管理员跳过从配置文件中读取默认值。

    With mysql_plugin, this option need not be given first on the command line, unlike most other MySQL programs that support --no-defaults.

    使用mysql_插件，不需要在命令行中首先给出这个选项，这与大多数其他支持mysql的程序不同——没有默认值。

  • --plugin-dir=dir_name, -p dir_name

    --plugin dir=目录名，-p目录名

    The server plugin directory.

    服务器插件目录。

  • --plugin-ini=file_name, -i file_name

    --plugin ini=文件名，-i文件名

    The mysql_plugin configuration file. Relative path names are interpreted relative to the current directory. If this option is not given, the default is plugin.ini in the plugin directory, where plugin is the plugin argument on the command line.

    mysql_插件配置文件。相对路径名是相对于当前目录解释的。如果未提供此选项，则默认为plugin目录中的plugin.ini，其中plugin是命令行上的plugin参数。

  • --print-defaults, -P

    --打印默认值，-p

    Display the default values from the configuration file. This option causes mysql_plugin to print the defaults for --basedir, --datadir, and --plugin-dir if they are found in the configuration file. If no value for a variable is found, nothing is shown.

    显示配置文件中的默认值。此选项将导致mysql_plugin打印--basedir、-datadir和--plugin dir（如果在配置文件中找到）的默认值。如果找不到变量的值，则不显示任何内容。

    With mysql_plugin, this option need not be given first on the command line, unlike most other MySQL programs that support --print-defaults.

    使用mysql_插件，不需要在命令行中首先给出这个选项，这与大多数其他支持打印默认值的mysql程序不同。

  • --verbose, -v

    --冗长，-v

    Verbose mode. Print more information about what the program does. This option can be used multiple times to increase the amount of information.

    详细模式。打印有关程序功能的详细信息。此选项可多次用于增加信息量。

  • --version, -V

    --版本，-v

    Display version information and exit.

    显示版本信息并退出。

4.4.4 mysql_secure_installation — Improve MySQL Installation Security

This program enables you to improve the security of your MySQL installation in the following ways:

此程序使您能够通过以下方式提高mysql安装的安全性：

  • You can set a password for root accounts.

    您可以为根帐户设置密码。

  • You can remove root accounts that are accessible from outside the local host.

    您可以删除可从本地主机外部访问的根帐户。

  • You can remove anonymous-user accounts.

    您可以删除匿名用户帐户。

  • You can remove the test database (which by default can be accessed by all users, even anonymous users), and privileges that permit anyone to access databases with names that start with test_.

    您可以删除测试数据库（默认情况下，所有用户，甚至匿名用户都可以访问该数据库），以及允许任何人访问名称以test开头的数据库的权限。

mysql_secure_installation helps you implement security recommendations similar to those described at Section 2.10.4, “Securing the Initial MySQL Account”.

mysql_secure_安装帮助您实现类似于2.10.4节“保护初始mysql帐户”中所述的安全建议。

Normal usage is to connect to the local MySQL server; invoke mysql_secure_installation without arguments:

通常的用法是连接到本地mysql服务器；无参数调用mysql_secure_安装：

shell> mysql_secure_installation

When executed, mysql_secure_installation prompts you to determine which actions to perform.

执行时，mysql_secure_安装会提示您确定要执行的操作。

The validate_password plugin can be used for password strength checking. If the plugin is not installed, mysql_secure_installation prompts the user whether to install it. Any passwords entered later are checked using the plugin if it is enabled.

验证密码插件可用于密码强度检查。如果插件没有安装，mysql_secure_installation会提示用户是否安装它。如果插件已启用，则稍后输入的任何密码都将使用该插件进行检查。

Most of the usual MySQL client options such as --host and --port can be used on the command line and in option files. For example, to connect to the local server over IPv6 using port 3307, use this command:

大多数常见的mysql客户机选项（如--host和--port）都可以在命令行和选项文件中使用。例如，要使用端口3307通过IPv6连接到本地服务器，请使用以下命令：

shell> mysql_secure_installation --host=::1 --port=3307

mysql_secure_installation supports the following options, which can be specified on the command line or in the [mysql_secure_installation] and [client] groups of an option file. For information about option files used by MySQL programs, see Section 4.2.2.2, “Using Option Files”.

mysql_secure_安装支持以下选项，可以在命令行或选项文件的[mysql_secure_安装]和[client]组中指定。有关mysql程序使用的选项文件的信息，请参阅4.2.2.2节“使用选项文件”。

Table 4.9 mysql_secure_installation Options

表4.9 MySQL安全安装选项

Option Name Description Introduced
--defaults-extra-file Read named option file in addition to usual option files 5.7.2
--defaults-file Read only named option file 5.7.2
--defaults-group-suffix Option group suffix value 5.7.2
--help Display help message and exit 5.7.2
--host Host on which MySQL server is located 5.7.2
--no-defaults Read no option files 5.7.2
--password Accepted but always ignored. Whenever mysql_secure_installation is invoked, the user is prompted for a password, regardless. 5.7.2
--port TCP/IP port number for connection 5.7.2
--print-defaults Print default options 5.7.2
--protocol Connection protocol to use 5.7.2
--socket Unix socket file or Windows named pipe to use 5.7.2
--ssl Enable connection encryption 5.7.2
--ssl-ca File that contains list of trusted SSL Certificate Authorities 5.7.2
--ssl-capath Directory that contains trusted SSL Certificate Authority certificate files 5.7.2
--ssl-cert File that contains X.509 certificate 5.7.2
--ssl-cipher Permissible ciphers for connection encryption 5.7.2
--ssl-crl File that contains certificate revocation lists 5.7.2
--ssl-crlpath Directory that contains certificate revocation-list files 5.7.2
--ssl-key File that contains X.509 key 5.7.2
--ssl-verify-server-cert Verify host name against server certificate Common Name identity 5.7.2
--tls-version Permissible TLS protocols for encrypted connections 5.7.10
--use-default Execute with no user interactivity 5.7.4
--user MySQL user name to use when connecting to server 5.7.2

  • --help, -?

    --救命啊，-？

    Display a help message and exit.

    显示帮助消息并退出。

  • --defaults-extra-file=file_name

    --defaults extra file=文件名

    Read this option file after the global option file but (on Unix) before the user option file. If the file does not exist or is otherwise inaccessible, an error occurs. file_name is interpreted relative to the current directory if given as a relative path name rather than a full path name.

    在全局选项文件之后，但在用户选项文件之前（在UNIX上）读取此选项文件。如果文件不存在或无法访问，则会发生错误。如果将文件名指定为相对路径名而不是完整路径名，则将其解释为相对于当前目录。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --defaults-file=file_name

    --默认文件=文件名

    Use only the given option file. If the file does not exist or is otherwise inaccessible, an error occurs. file_name is interpreted relative to the current directory if given as a relative path name rather than a full path name.

    只使用给定的选项文件。如果文件不存在或无法访问，则会发生错误。如果将文件名指定为相对路径名而不是完整路径名，则将其解释为相对于当前目录。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --defaults-group-suffix=str

    --默认组后缀=str

    Read not only the usual option groups, but also groups with the usual names and a suffix of str. For example, mysql_secure_installation normally reads the [client] and [mysql_secure_installation] groups. If the --defaults-group-suffix=_other option is given, mysql_secure_installation also reads the [client_other] and [mysql_secure_installation_other] groups.

    不仅读取常用选项组，还读取具有常用名称和后缀str的组。例如，mysql_secure_installation通常读取[client]和[mysql_secure_installation]组。如果给定了--defaults group suffix=\u other选项，mysql\u secure\u installation也会读取[client\u other]和[mysql\u secure\u installation\u other]组。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --host=host_name, -h host_name

    --host=主机名，-h主机名

    Connect to the MySQL server on the given host.

    连接到给定主机上的mysql服务器。

  • --no-defaults

    --无默认值

    Do not read any option files. If program startup fails due to reading unknown options from an option file, --no-defaults can be used to prevent them from being read.

    不要读取任何选项文件。如果由于从选项文件中读取未知选项而导致程序启动失败，-不能使用默认值来阻止读取这些选项。

    The exception is that the .mylogin.cnf file, if it exists, is read in all cases. This permits passwords to be specified in a safer way than on the command line even when --no-defaults is used. (.mylogin.cnf is created by the mysql_config_editor utility. See Section 4.6.6, “mysql_config_editor — MySQL Configuration Utility”.)

    例外情况是.MyLogin .CNF文件（如果存在的话）在所有情况下都会被读取。这允许以比在命令行上更安全的方式指定密码，即使没有使用默认值。（.mylogin.cnf是由mysql配置编辑器实用程序创建的。参见第4.6.6节“mysql配置编辑器-mysql配置实用程序”。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --password=password, -p password

    --password=密码，-p密码

    This option is accepted but ignored. Whether or not this option is used, mysql_secure_installation always prompts the user for a password.

    此选项被接受但被忽略。无论是否使用此选项，mysql_secure_安装都会提示用户输入密码。

  • --port=port_num, -P port_num

    --端口=端口号，-p端口号

    For TCP/IP connections, the port number to use.

    对于TCP/IP连接，使用的端口号。

  • --print-defaults

    --打印默认值

    Print the program name and all options that it gets from option files.

    打印程序名及其从选项文件中获得的所有选项。

    For additional information about this and other option-file options, see Section 4.2.2.3, “Command-Line Options that Affect Option-File Handling”.

    有关此选项和其他选项文件选项的其他信息，请参见第4.2.2.3节“影响选项文件处理的命令行选项”。

  • --protocol={TCP|SOCKET|PIPE|MEMORY}

    --协议{tcp套接字管道内存}

    The connection protocol to use for connecting to the server. It is useful when the other connection parameters normally result in use of a protocol other than the one you want. For details on the permissible values, see Section 4.2.4, “Connecting to the MySQL Server Using Command Options”.

    用于连接到服务器的连接协议。当其他连接参数通常导致使用所需协议以外的协议时，它非常有用。有关允许值的详细信息，请参阅4.2.4节，“使用命令选项连接到mysql服务器”。

  • --socket=path, -S path

    --套接字=路径，-s路径

    For connections to localhost, the Unix socket file to use, or, on Windows, the name of the named pipe to use.

    对于到本地主机的连接，要使用的unix套接字文件，或者在windows上，要使用的命名管道的名称。

    On Windows, this option applies only if the server was started with the named_pipe system variable enabled to support named-pipe connections. In addition, the user making the connection must be a member of the Windows group specified by the named_pipe_full_access_group system variable.

    在Windows上，只有在服务器启动时启用了支持命名管道连接的命名管道系统变量，此选项才适用。此外，进行连接的用户必须是由命名的“管道完全访问”组系统变量指定的Windows组的成员。

  • --ssl*

    --SSL协议*

    Options that begin with --ssl specify whether to connect to the server using SSL and indicate where to find SSL keys and certificates. See Command Options for Encrypted Connections.

    以--ssl开头的选项指定是否使用ssl连接到服务器，并指示在何处查找ssl密钥和证书。请参见加密连接的命令选项。

  • --tls-version=protocol_list

    --TLS version=协议列表

    The permissible TLS protocols for encrypted connections. The value is a list of one or more comma-separated protocol names. The protocols that can be named for this option depend on the SSL library used to compile MySQL. For details, see Section 6.3.2, “Encrypted Connection TLS Protocols and Ciphers”.

    加密连接允许的TLS协议。该值是一个或多个以逗号分隔的协议名称的列表。可以为此选项命名的协议取决于用于编译mysql的ssl库。有关详细信息，请参阅第6.3.2节“加密连接TLS协议和密码”。

    This option was added in MySQL 5.7.10.

    这个选项是在mysql 5.7.10中添加的。

  • --use-default

    --使用默认值

    Execute noninteractively. This option can be used for unattended installation operations.

    非交互执行。此选项可用于无人参与的安装操作。

  • --user=user_name, -u user_name

    --user=用户名，-u用户名

    The user name of the MySQL account to use for connecting to the server.

    用于连接到服务器的MySQL帐户的用户名。

4.4.5 mysql_ssl_rsa_setup — Create SSL/RSA Files

This program creates the SSL certificate and key files and RSA key-pair files required to support secure connections using SSL and secure password exchange using RSA over unencrypted connections, if those files are missing. mysql_ssl_rsa_setup can also be used to create new SSL files if the existing ones have expired.

此程序创建SSL证书和密钥文件以及支持使用SSL的安全连接所需的RSA密钥对文件，如果缺少这些文件，则在未加密的连接上使用RSA进行安全密码交换。如果现有的SSL文件已经过期，MySqLSSLSYRSAUSET也可以用来创建新的SSL文件。

Note

mysql_ssl_rsa_setup uses the openssl command, so its use is contingent on having OpenSSL installed on your machine.

mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序使用openssl命令，因此它的使用取决于您的计算机上是否安装了openssl。

Another way to generate SSL and RSA files, for MySQL distributions compiled using OpenSSL, is to have the server generate them automatically. See Section 6.3.3.1, “Creating SSL and RSA Certificates and Keys using MySQL”.

对于使用openssl编译的mysql发行版，生成ssl和rsa文件的另一种方法是让服务器自动生成它们。参见第6.3.3.1节“使用mysql创建ssl和rsa证书和密钥”。

Important

mysql_ssl_rsa_setup helps lower the barrier to using SSL by making it easier to generate the required files. However, certificates generated by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup are self-signed, which is not very secure. After you gain experience using the files created by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup, consider obtaining a CA certificate from a registered certificate authority.

mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序使生成所需文件变得更容易，从而帮助降低使用ssl的障碍。但是，mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序生成的证书是自签名的，这不是很安全。使用mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序创建的文件获得经验后，请考虑从注册的证书颁发机构获取ca证书。

Invoke mysql_ssl_rsa_setup like this:

调用mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序，如下所示：

shell> mysql_ssl_rsa_setup [options]

Typical options are --datadir to specify where to create the files, and --verbose to see the openssl commands that mysql_ssl_rsa_setup executes.

典型的选项是--datadir指定创建文件的位置，以及--verbose查看mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序执行的openssl命令。

mysql_ssl_rsa_setup attempts to create SSL and RSA files using a default set of file names. It works as follows:

mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序尝试使用默认文件名集创建ssl和rsa文件。其工作原理如下：

  1. mysql_ssl_rsa_setup checks for the openssl binary at the locations specified by the PATH environment variable. If openssl is not found, mysql_ssl_rsa_setup does nothing. If openssl is present, mysql_ssl_rsa_setup looks for default SSL and RSA files in the MySQL data directory specified by the --datadir option, or the compiled-in data directory if the --datadir option is not given.

    mysql_ssl_rsa_setup在path环境变量指定的位置检查openssl二进制文件。如果找不到openssl，mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序将不执行任何操作。如果存在openssl，mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序将在--datadir选项指定的mysql数据目录中查找默认的ssl和rsa文件，如果未指定--datadir选项，则在数据目录中查找编译的ssl和rsa文件。

  2. mysql_ssl_rsa_setup checks the data directory for SSL files with the following names:

    mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序检查数据目录中是否存在具有以下名称的ssl文件：

    ca.pem
server-cert.pem
server-key.pem

  3. If any of those files are present, mysql_ssl_rsa_setup creates no SSL files. Otherwise, it invokes openssl to create them, plus some additional files:

    如果存在这些文件中的任何一个，mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序将不创建ssl文件。否则，它将调用openssl来创建它们，以及一些附加文件：

    ca.pem               Self-signed CA certificate
ca-key.pem           CA private key
server-cert.pem      Server certificate
server-key.pem       Server private key
client-cert.pem      Client certificate
client-key.pem       Client private key

    These files enable secure client connections using SSL; see Section 6.3.1, “Configuring MySQL to Use Encrypted Connections”.

    这些文件支持使用ssl的安全客户端连接；请参阅第6.3.1节“配置mysql以使用加密连接”。

  4. mysql_ssl_rsa_setup checks the data directory for RSA files with the following names:

    mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序检查数据目录中是否存在具有以下名称的rsa文件：

    private_key.pem      Private member of private/public key pair
public_key.pem       Public member of private/public key pair

  5. If any of these files are present, mysql_ssl_rsa_setup creates no RSA files. Otherwise, it invokes openssl to create them. These files enable secure password exchange using RSA over unencrypted connections for accounts authenticated by the sha256_password plugin; see Section 6.4.1.5, “SHA-256 Pluggable Authentication”.

    如果存在这些文件中的任何一个，mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序将不创建rsa文件。否则，它将调用openssl来创建它们。这些文件支持通过sha256_密码插件验证的帐户在未加密连接上使用rsa进行安全密码交换；请参阅第6.4.1.5节“sha-256可插入身份验证”。

For information about the characteristics of files created by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup, see Section 6.3.3.1, “Creating SSL and RSA Certificates and Keys using MySQL”.

有关mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序创建的文件特性的信息，请参阅第6.3.3.1节“使用mysql创建ssl和rsa证书和密钥”。

At startup, the MySQL server automatically uses the SSL files created by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup to enable SSL if no explicit SSL options are given other than --ssl (possibly along with --ssl-cipher). If you prefer to designate the files explicitly, invoke clients with the --ssl-ca, --ssl-cert, and --ssl-key options at startup to name the ca.pem, server-cert.pem, and server-key.pem files, respectively.

在启动时，如果除了--ssl（可能还有--ssl-cipher）之外没有提供明确的ssl选项，mysql服务器会自动使用mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序创建的ssl文件来启用ssl。如果希望显式指定这些文件，请在启动时使用--ssl ca、--ssl cert和--ssl key选项调用客户端，分别命名ca.pem、server-cert.pem和server-key.pem文件。

The server also automatically uses the RSA files created by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup to enable RSA if no explicit RSA options are given.

如果没有给出明确的rsa选项，服务器还会自动使用mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序创建的rsa文件来启用rsa。

If the server is SSL-enabled, clients use SSL by default for the connection. To specify certificate and key files explicitly, use the --ssl-ca, --ssl-cert, and --ssl-key options to name the ca.pem, client-cert.pem, and client-key.pem files, respectively. However, some additional client setup may be required first because mysql_ssl_rsa_setup by default creates those files in the data directory. The permissions for the data directory normally enable access only to the system account that runs the MySQL server, so client programs cannot use files located there. To make the files available, copy them to a directory that is readable (but not writable) by clients:

如果服务器启用了ssl，则客户端默认使用ssl进行连接。要显式指定证书和密钥文件，请使用--ssl ca，--ssl cert和--ssl key选项分别命名ca.pem、client-cert.pem和client-key.pem文件。但是，可能首先需要一些额外的客户端设置，因为mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序默认情况下会在数据目录中创建这些文件。数据目录的权限通常只允许访问运行mysql服务器的系统帐户，因此客户端程序不能使用位于该目录的文件。要使文件可用，请将它们复制到客户端可读（但不可写）的目录：

  • For local clients, the MySQL installation directory can be used. For example, if the data directory is a subdirectory of the installation directory and your current location is the data directory, you can copy the files like this:

    对于本地客户机，可以使用mysql安装目录。例如，如果数据目录是安装目录的子目录，而当前位置是数据目录，则可以复制如下文件：

    cp ca.pem client-cert.pem client-key.pem ..

  • For remote clients, distribute the files using a secure channel to ensure they are not tampered with during transit.

    对于远程客户端，使用安全通道分发文件，以确保在传输过程中不会被篡改。

If the SSL files used for a MySQL installation have expired, you can use mysql_ssl_rsa_setup to create new ones:

如果用于MySQL安装的SSL文件已过期，则可以使用MySQL SSL RSA安装程序创建新文件：

  1. Stop the server.

    停止服务器。

  2. Rename or remove the existing SSL files. You may wish to make a backup of them first. (The RSA files do not expire, so you need not remove them. mysql_ssl_rsa_setup will see that they exist and not overwrite them.)

    重命名或删除现有的SSL文件。你可以先备份一下。（RSA文件不会过期，因此不需要删除它们。MySqLssLyrSAIsFutter将看到它们存在而不重写它们。

  3. Run mysql_ssl_rsa_setup with the --datadir option to specify where to create the new files.

    使用--datadir选项运行mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序，以指定创建新文件的位置。

  4. Restart the server.

    重新启动服务器。

mysql_ssl_rsa_setup supports the following command-line options, which can be specified on the command line or in the [mysql_ssl_rsa_setup], [mysql_install_db], and [mysqld] groups of an option file. For information about option files used by MySQL programs, see Section 4.2.2.2, “Using Option Files”.

mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序支持以下命令行选项，这些选项可以在命令行或选项文件的[mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序]、[mysql_install_db]和[mysqld]组中指定。有关mysql程序使用的选项文件的信息，请参阅4.2.2.2节“使用选项文件”。

Table 4.10 mysql_ssl_rsa_setup Options

表4.10 MySQL SSL RSA安装选项

Option Name Description Introduced
--datadir Path to data directory
--help Display help message and exit
--suffix Suffix for X.509 certificate Common Name attribute
--uid Name of effective user to use for file permissions 5.7.8
--verbose Verbose mode
--version Display version information and exit

  • --help, ?

    --帮忙，？

    Display a help message and exit.

    显示帮助消息并退出。

  • --datadir=dir_name

    --datadir=目录名

    The path to the directory that mysql_ssl_rsa_setup should check for default SSL and RSA files and in which it should create files if they are missing. The default is the compiled-in data directory.

    mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序应检查默认ssl和rsa文件的目录路径，如果文件丢失，应在其中创建文件。默认为compiled in data目录。

  • --suffix=str

    --后缀=str

    The suffix for the Common Name attribute in X.509 certificates. The suffix value is limited to 17 characters. The default is based on the MySQL version number.

    X.509证书中公共名称属性的后缀。后缀值限制为17个字符。默认值基于mysql版本号。

  • --uid=name, -v

    --uid=名称，-v

    The name of the user who should be the owner of any created files. The value is a user name, not a numeric user ID. In the absence of this option, files created by mysql_ssl_rsa_setup are owned by the user who executes it. This option is valid only if you execute the program as root on a system that supports the chown() system call.

    应为任何已创建文件的所有者的用户的名称。该值是用户名，而不是数字用户ID。如果没有此选项，由mysql_ssl_rsa_安装程序创建的文件归执行它的用户所有。只有在支持chown（）系统调用的系统上以根用户身份执行程序时，此选项才有效。

  • --verbose, -v

    --冗长，-v

    Verbose mode. Produce more output about what the program does. For example, the program shows the openssl commands it runs, and produces output to indicate whether it skips SSL or RSA file creation because some default file already exists.

    详细模式。产生更多关于程序工作的输出。例如，程序显示它运行的OpenSSL命令，并生成输出以指示它是否跳过SSL或RSA文件创建，因为某些默认文件已经存在。

  • --version, -V

    --版本，-v

    Display version information and exit.

    显示版本信息并退出。

4.4.6 mysql_tzinfo_to_sql — Load the Time Zone Tables

The mysql_tzinfo_to_sql program loads the time zone tables in the mysql database. It is used on systems that have a zoneinfo database (the set of files describing time zones). Examples of such systems are Linux, FreeBSD, Solaris, and OS X. One likely location for these files is the /usr/share/zoneinfo directory (/usr/share/lib/zoneinfo on Solaris). If your system does not have a zoneinfo database, you can use the downloadable package described in Section 5.1.12, “MySQL Server Time Zone Support”.

mysql_tzinfo_to_sql程序加载mysql数据库中的时区表。它用于具有区域信息数据库（描述时区的一组文件）的系统。此类系统的示例包括Linux、FreeBSD、solaris和OS X。这些文件的一个可能位置是/usr/share/zoneinfo目录（solaris上的/usr/share/lib/zoneinfo）。如果您的系统没有Zoneinfo数据库，您可以使用5.1.12节“MySQL服务器时区支持”中描述的可下载包。

mysql_tzinfo_to_sql can be invoked several ways:

mysql_tzinfo_to_sql可以通过多种方式调用：

shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql tz_dir
shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql tz_file tz_name
shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql --leap tz_file

For the first invocation syntax, pass the zoneinfo directory path name to mysql_tzinfo_to_sql and send the output into the mysql program. For example:

对于第一个调用语法，将zoneinfo目录路径名传递给mysql_tzinfo_to_sql，并将输出发送到mysql程序。例如：

shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql /usr/share/zoneinfo | mysql -u root mysql

mysql_tzinfo_to_sql reads your system's time zone files and generates SQL statements from them. mysql processes those statements to load the time zone tables.

mysql_tzinfo_to_sql读取系统的时区文件并从中生成sql语句。mysql处理这些语句以加载时区表。

The second syntax causes mysql_tzinfo_to_sql to load a single time zone file tz_file that corresponds to a time zone name tz_name:

第二种语法使mysql_tzinfo_to_sql加载与时区名称tzinfo_name相对应的单个时区文件tzinfo_file：

shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql tz_file tz_name | mysql -u root mysql

If your time zone needs to account for leap seconds, invoke mysql_tzinfo_to_sql using the third syntax, which initializes the leap second information. tz_file is the name of your time zone file:

如果时区需要计算闰秒，请使用第三种语法调用mysql_tzinfo_to_sql，该语法初始化闰秒信息。Tz_文件是您的时区文件的名称：

shell> mysql_tzinfo_to_sql --leap tz_file | mysql -u root mysql

After running mysql_tzinfo_to_sql, it is best to restart the server so that it does not continue to use any previously cached time zone data.

在运行mysql_tzinfo_to_sql之后，最好重新启动服务器，这样它就不会继续使用任何以前缓存的时区数据。

4.4.7 mysql_upgrade — Check and Upgrade MySQL Tables

Each time you upgrade MySQL, you should execute mysql_upgrade, which looks for incompatibilities with the upgraded MySQL server:

每次升级mysql时，都要执行mysql_upgrade，查找与升级后的mysql服务器的不兼容：

  • It upgrades the system tables in the mysql schema so that you can take advantage of new privileges or capabilities that might have been added.

    它会升级mysql模式中的系统表，以便您可以利用可能已添加的新特权或功能。

  • It upgrades the Performance Schema and sys schema.

    它升级了性能模式和sys模式。

  • It examines user schemas.

    它检查用户模式。

If mysql_upgrade finds that a table has a possible incompatibility, it performs a table check and, if problems are found, attempts a table repair. If the table cannot be repaired, see Section 2.11.12, “Rebuilding or Repairing Tables or Indexes” for manual table repair strategies.

如果mysql_upgrade发现某个表可能存在不兼容，它将执行表检查，如果发现问题，将尝试表修复。如果表格无法修复，请参阅第2.11.12节“重建或修复表格或索引”了解手动表格修复策略。

mysql_upgrade communicates directly with the MySQL server, sending it the SQL statements required to perform an upgrade.

mysql_upgrade直接与mysql服务器通信，向其发送执行升级所需的sql语句。

Important

As of MySQL 5.7.12, the default --early-plugin-load value is empty. To load the keyring_file plugin, you must use an explicit --early-plugin-load option with a nonempty value.

从mysql 5.7.12开始，默认的——早期插件加载值为空。若要加载keyring_文件插件，必须使用带有非空值的显式--early-plugin加载选项。

In MySQL 5.7.11, the default --early-plugin-load value was the name of the keyring_file plugin library file, so that plugin was loaded by default. InnoDB tablespace encryption requires the keyring_file plugin to be loaded prior to InnoDB initialization, so this change of default value introduces an incompatibility for upgrades from 5.7.11 to 5.7.12 or higher. Administrators who have encrypted InnoDB tablespaces must take explicit action to ensure continued loading of the keyring_file plugin: Start the server with an --early-plugin-load option that names the plugin library file. For additional information, see Section 6.4.4, “The MySQL Keyring”.

在mysql 5.7.11中，默认的——早期插件加载值是keyring_文件插件库文件的名称，因此默认情况下加载了该插件。innodb tablespace encryption要求在innodb初始化之前加载keyring_文件插件，因此这个默认值的改变引入了从5.7.11升级到5.7.12或更高版本的不兼容性。加密了innodb表空间的管理员必须采取明确的措施来确保keyring_文件插件的继续加载：使用命名插件库文件的--early plugin load选项启动服务器。有关更多信息，请参见第6.4.4节“mysql keyring”。

Important

If you upgrade to MySQL 5.7.2 or later from a version older than 5.7.2, a change to the mysql.user table requires a special sequence of steps to perform an upgrade using mysql_upgrade. For details, see Section 2.11.3, “Changes in MySQL 5.7”.

如果从早于5.7.2的版本升级到mysql 5.7.2或更高版本，对mysql.user表的更改需要一系列特殊的步骤才能使用mysql_upgrade执行升级。有关详细信息，请参阅2.11.3节，“MySQL5.7中的更改”。

Note

On Windows, you must run mysql_upgrade with administrator privileges. You can do this by running a Command Prompt as Administrator and running the command. Failure to do so may result in the upgrade failing to execute correctly.

在Windows上，必须以管理员权限运行mysql_upgrade。可以通过以管理员身份运行命令提示符并运行该命令来完成此操作。否则可能导致升级无法正确执行。

Caution

You should always back up your current MySQL installation before performing an upgrade. See Section 7.2, “Database Backup Methods”.

在执行升级之前，您应该始终备份当前的mysql安装。见第7.2节“数据库备份方法”。

Some upgrade incompatibilities may require special handling before upgrading your MySQL installation and running mysql_upgrade. See Section 2.11, “Upgrading MySQL”, for instructions on determining whether any such incompatibilities apply to your installation and how to handle them.

在升级mysql安装并运行mysql_upgrade之前，某些升级不兼容可能需要特殊处理。请参阅2.11节“升级mysql”，以了解有关确定此类不兼容是否适用于您的安装以及如何处理它们的说明。

Use mysql_upgrade like this:

像这样使用mysql_升级：

  1. Ensure that the server is running.

    确保服务器正在运行。

  2. Invoke mysql_upgrade to upgrade the system tables in the mysql schema and check and repair tables in other schemas:

    调用mysql_upgrade以升级mysql模式中的系统表，并检查和修复其他模式中的表：

    shell> mysql_upgrade [options]

  3. Stop the server and restart it so that any system table changes take effect.

    停止服务器并重新启动，以便任何系统表更改生效。

If you have multiple MySQL server instances to upgrade, invoke mysql_upgrade with connection parameters appropriate for connecting to each of the desired servers. For example, with servers running on the local host on parts 3306 through 3308, upgrade each of them by connecting to the appropriate port:

如果要升级多个mysql服务器实例，请使用适合于连接到每个所需服务器的连接参数调用mysql_upgrade。例如，在部件3306到3308的本地主机上运行服务器时，通过连接到适当的端口来升级每个服务器：

shell> mysql_upgrade --protocol=tcp -P 3306 [other_options]
shell> mysql_upgrade --protocol=tcp -P 3307 [other_options]
shell> mysql_upgrade --protocol=tcp -P 3308 [other_options]

For local host connections on Unix, the --protocol=tcp option forces a connection using TCP/IP rather than the Unix socket file.

对于UNIX上的本地主机连接，--protocol=tcp选项强制使用TCP/IP而不是UNIX套接字文件进行连接。

By default, mysql_upgrade runs as the MySQL root user. If the root password is expired when you run mysql_upgrade, you will see a message that your password is expired and that mysql_upgrade failed as a result. To correct this, reset the root password to unexpire it and run mysql_upgrade again. First, connect to the server as root:

默认情况下，mysql_upgrade作为mysql根用户运行。如果在运行mysql_upgrade时根密码已过期，您将看到一条消息，表明您的密码已过期，因此mysql_upgrade失败。若要更正此问题，请重置根密码使其过期，然后再次运行mysql_upgrade。首先，以根用户身份连接到服务器：

shell> mysql -u root -p
Enter password: ****  <- enter root password here

Reset the password using ALTER USER:

使用alter user重置密码：

mysql> ALTER USER USER() IDENTIFIED BY 'root-password';

Then exit mysql and run mysql_upgrade again:

然后退出mysql并再次运行mysql升级：

shell> mysql_upgrade [options]
Note

If you run the server with the disabled_storage_engines system variable set to disable certain storage engines (for example, MyISAM), mysql_upgrade might fail with an error like this:

如果在运行服务器时将disabled_storage_engines系统变量设置为禁用某些存储引擎（例如myisam），则mysql_升级可能会失败，并出现如下错误：

mysql_upgrade: [ERROR] 3161: Storage engine MyISAM is disabled
(Table creation is disallowed).

To handle this, restart the server with disabled_storage_engines disabled. Then you should be able to run mysql_upgrade successfully. After that, restart the server with disabled_storage_engines set to its original value.

要处理此问题，请在禁用存储引擎的情况下重新启动服务器。那么您应该能够成功运行mysql_升级。之后，在禁用的存储引擎设置为其原始值的情况下重新启动服务器。

Unless invoked with the --upgrade-system-tables option, mysql_upgrade processes all tables in all user schemas as necessary. Table checking might take a long time to complete. Each table is locked and therefore unavailable to other sessions while it is being processed. Check and repair operations can be time-consuming, particularly for large tables. Table checking uses the FOR UPGRADE option of the CHECK TABLE statement. For details about what this option entails, see Section 13.7.2.2, “CHECK TABLE Syntax”.

除非使用--upgrade system tables选项调用，否则mysql_upgrade会根据需要处理所有用户模式中的所有表。表检查可能需要很长时间才能完成。每个表都被锁定，因此在处理它时，其他会话无法使用它。检查和修复操作可能非常耗时，特别是对于大型表。表检查使用check table语句的for upgrade选项。有关此选项的详细信息，请参阅第13.7.2.2节“检查表语法”。

mysql_upgrade marks all checked and repaired tables with the current MySQL version number. This ensures that the next time you run mysql_upgrade with the same version of the server, it can be determined whether there is any need to check or repair a given table again.

mysql_upgrade使用当前mysql版本号标记所有已检查和修复的表。这样可以确保下次使用相同版本的服务器运行mysql_upgrade时，可以确定是否需要再次检查或修复给定的表。

mysql_upgrade saves the MySQL version number in a file named mysql_upgrade_info in the data directory. This is used to quickly check whether all tables have been checked for this release so that table-checking can be skipped. To ignore this file and perform the check regardless, use the --force option.

mysql_upgrade将mysql版本号保存在数据目录中名为mysql_upgrade_info的文件中。这用于快速检查是否已检查此版本的所有表，以便可以跳过表检查。要忽略此文件并执行检查，请使用--force选项。

As of MySQL 5.7.2, mysql_upgrade checks mysql.user system table rows and, for any row with an empty plugin column, sets that column to 'mysql_native_password' or 'mysql_old_password' depending on the hash format of the Password column value. As of MySQL 5.7.5, support for pre-4.1 password hashing and mysql_old_password was removed, so mysql_upgrade sets empty plugin values to 'mysql_native_password' if the credentials use a hash format compatible with that plugin. Rows with a pre-4.1 password hash must be upgraded manually. For account upgrade instructions, see Section 6.4.1.3, “Migrating Away from Pre-4.1 Password Hashing and the mysql_old_password Plugin”.

从mysql 5.7.2开始，mysql_upgrade将检查mysql.user系统表行，对于插件列为空的任何行，根据密码列值的哈希格式，将该列设置为“mysql_native_password”或“mysql_old_password”。从mysql 5.7.5开始，对pre-4.1密码散列和mysql_old_password的支持已被删除，因此如果凭据使用与该插件兼容的散列格式，mysql_upgrade会将空插件值设置为“mysql_native_password”。必须手动升级具有4.1之前版本密码哈希的行。有关帐户升级的说明，请参阅6.4.1.3节，“从4.1之前的密码散列和mysql旧密码插件迁移”。

mysql_upgrade does not upgrade the contents of the time zone tables or help tables. For upgrade instructions, see Section 5.1.12, “MySQL Server Time Zone Support”, and Section 5.1.13, “Server-Side Help Support”.

mysql_upgrade不升级时区表或帮助表的内容。有关升级说明，请参阅第5.1.12节“MySQL服务器时区支持”和第5.1.13节“服务器端帮助支持”。

As of MySQL 5.7.7, unless invoked with the --skip-sys-schema option, mysql_upgrade installs the sys schema if it is not installed, and upgrades it to the current version otherwise. An error occurs if a sys schema exists but has no version view, on the assumption that its absence indicates a user-created schema:

从mysql 5.7.7开始，除非使用--skip sys schema选项调用，否则mysql_upgrade会在未安装sys schema的情况下安装它，否则会将其升级到当前版本。如果存在sys模式但没有版本视图，则会出现错误，前提是它的缺省指示用户创建的模式：

A sys schema exists with no sys.version view. If
you have a user created sys schema, this must be renamed for the
upgrade to succeed.

To upgrade in this case, remove or rename the existing sys schema first.

在这种情况下升级，首先删除或重命名现有的sys模式。

In MySQL 5.7.9 and later, mysql_upgrade checks for partitioned InnoDB tables that were created using the generic partitioning handler and attempts to upgrade them to InnoDB native partitioning (used in MySQL 5.7.6 and later). (Bug #76734, Bug #20727344) Also beginning with MySQL 5.7.9, you can upgrade such tables individually in the mysql client using the ALTER TABLE ... UPGRADE PARTITIONING SQL statement.

在mysql 5.7.9及更高版本中，mysql_upgrade检查使用通用分区处理程序创建的分区innodb表，并尝试将它们升级到innodb本机分区（在mysql 5.7.6及更高版本中使用）。（bug 76734，bug 20727344）同样从mysql 5.7.9开始，您可以使用alter table在mysql客户机中单独升级这些表……升级分区SQL语句。
